thread.title: IBM Bluemix Local Rounds Out Hybrid Cloud Model
thread.title_full: IBM Bluemix Local Rounds Out Hybrid Cloud Model

author: Dunlap, Charlotte
title: IBM Bluemix Local Rounds Out Hybrid Cloud Model
text: October 01, 2015 Rate this report Intelligence Alert IBM wants to make its on-premises cloud experience a mirror image of public cloud for developers and DevOps, in terms of instant update syncing and visibility, as it builds out its hybrid offering.
